## [Properties](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/SubscriptionResponse#properties)

`data``[Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscription) (Required) 

`included``[*]`

 Possible types: `[PromotedPurchase`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/promotedpurchase), [`SubscriptionAppStoreReviewScreenshot`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionappstorereviewscreenshot), [`SubscriptionAvailability`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionavailability), [`SubscriptionGroup`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptiongroup), [`SubscriptionImage`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionimage), [`SubscriptionIntroductoryOffer`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionintroductoryoffer), [`SubscriptionLocalization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionlocalization), [`SubscriptionOfferCode`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionoffercode), [`SubscriptionPrice`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionprice), [`SubscriptionPromotionalOffer`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionpromotionaloffer), [`WinBackOffer`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/winbackoffer)`links``[DocumentLinks`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/documentlinks) (Required)
